thread.title: This year's modern Sonic game is called Sonic Forces
thread.title_full: This year's modern Sonic game is called Sonic Forces

author: Jordan Devore
title: This year's modern Sonic game is called Sonic Forces
text:
0 
Holiday 2017 
Sega plans to put out two Sonic games this year -- one retro, one modern. We know all about the former, Sonic Mania . The latter? It's less of a known quantity , but the details are coming into frame. 
The game has shed its "Project Sonic 2017" working title in favor of a new name: Sonic Forces . 
Along with the artwork above, Sega says it will upload "the first gameplay footage" tomorrow. For an off-screen glimpse at Sonic Forces because off course there's an off-screen capture, look no further . World exclusive gameplay footage of SONIC FORCES at #SXSWGaming . Created on new "Hedgehog 2" game engine. #SonicAtSXSW pic.twitter.com/r0khJEGrvW
